alert.note: Alert for Alexander; Pulaski (Illinois) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Paducah (Southern Illinois and Indiana, Southeastern Missouri and Western Kentucky)
info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued July 02 at 4:28PM CDT until July 02 at 4:45PM CDT by NWS Paducah
info.description: ...A SEVERE THUNDERSTORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 445 PM CDT FOR WESTERN PULASKI...SOUTHEASTERN ALEXANDER...NORTHERN MISSISSIPPI AND SOUTHEASTERN SCOTT COUNTIES... At 428 PM CDT, a severe thunderstorm was located near Mounds, or near Cairo, moving east at 40 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect damage to roofs, siding, and trees. Locations impacted include... Cairo, Mounds, Tamms, Mound City, Olive Branch, Horseshoe Lake Conservation Area, Olmsted, Pulaski and Diehlstadt. This includes the following highways... Interstate 57 in Illinois between Mile Markers 1 and 16. Interstate 57 in Missouri between Mile Markers 15 and 21. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...<.75 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
